title: S4 Ep8: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 4 – Smoke and Mirrors
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 4 – Smoke and Mirrors
description:
October 3, 2019 / Rebecca Lavoie hosts with guests Susan Simpson, Rabia Chaudry, and Ivan Bates, discussing episode 4 of the series and the murder weapon.
 
Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
 
Today’s addendum has been sponsored by SimpliSafe.
